snippet: Cho Hyun-ah, daughter of the chairman of the conglomerate that operates the airline, resigned as head of the airline’s in-flight services after an uproar in South Korea over the episode.
abstract: Cho Hyun-ah resigns as head of Korean Air Lines' flight service after media uproar in South Korea over her behavior on flight when she was served macadamia nuts; she ordered that jet return to gate and had senior flight attendant removed from plane; she is daughter of chairman of conglomerate that runs airline.
lead_paragraph: Cho Hyun-ah, daughter of the chairman of the conglomerate that operates the airline, resigned as head of the airline’s in-flight services after an uproar in South Korea over the episode.

headline.main: Korean Air Executive Resigns Post After Halting Flight Over Snack Service
headline.print_headline: A Scolding Over Snacks Gets Airline Into Trouble
